template.name: peerauthentication
template.value: apiVersion: security.istio.io/v1 kind: PeerAuthentication metadata: name: $NAME$ spec: selector: matchLabels: app.kubernetes.io/name: $NAME_LABEL$ app.kubernetes.io/component: $COMPONENT_LABEL$ mtls: mode: STRICT

template.name: sidecar
template.value: apiVersion: networking.istio.io/v1 kind: Sidecar metadata: name: $NAME$ spec: workloadSelector: labels: app.kubernetes.io/name: $NAME_LABEL$ app.kubernetes.io/component: $COMPONENT_LABEL$ outboundTrafficPolicy: mode: REGISTRY_ONLY egress: - captureMode: DEFAULT hosts: - ./* - istio-system/istiod.istio-system.svc.cluster.local - otel/otel-agent.otel.svc.cluster.local
